ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: DMG for last hits. Cuts ganking paths anew. Counters Furion.
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: DMG for last hits. HP for lane staying power. Builds into urn.
ItemTooltips.gem: The support should buy this, but if you have to get yourself, do so. Obvious counter to pesky invis heroes.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Rush this first. Invaluable for rune control and mana replenishment.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Screw phaseboots. Extra IAS, HP and DMG. Int swapping for a bit more mana. Tower dive like a pro.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Some people skip this over bottle. I take both. Regen for you, damage for foes.
ItemTooltips.assault: Even MORE IAS and extra survivability.
ItemTooltips.heart: Remain a behemoth in the lategame with this item. Dive in and out of battle to trigger regen when necessary.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Consider BKB after basher if the enemy team is high on disables.
ItemTooltips.basher: Your attack speed is insane. Basher will give you free mini stuns.
ItemTooltips.satanic: The game should never get this far.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Lifestealing helps with those towerdives, builds into a Satanic much later.

AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_void: Max this first no matter what.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_crippling_fear: You may delay this in favor of Hunter In The Night if the enemy team lacks disables.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night: IAS and MS. Max this after void. You may choose to skip crippling fear early depending on how many disables the enemy has.
AbilityTooltips.night_stalker_darkness: Use this to extend the night cycle, max it ASAP.
